description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant Google Project Zero author information. Open-source intelligence (OSINT) is data collected from publicly available sources to be used in an intelligence context. In the intelligence community, the term open refers to overt, publicly available sources (as opposed to covert or clandestine sources). It is not related to open-source software or collective intelligence.
name: OSRS Project Zero Author Index

values.value: OSRS CVE Author Index: Aaron Bishop

values.description: Security researcher and CVE author. Information Security Specialist - Intern at Trend Micro.
values.value: OSRS CVE Author Index: Ashish Verma
